Key Arguments: The legislation represents a form of censorship and restricts free communication.
Empowering a government body to determine truth could lead to a dictatorship.
Censorship stifles robust discussion, which is essential for democracy.
Free and open debate is the best solution to misinformation and disinformation.
Notable Quotes: I absolutely oppose any form of censorship in Australia and DO NOT support this legislation or Bill in any way, shape or form.
This proposed Bill should be very concerning for our Democracy.
The best solution for disinformation/misinformation is free and open debate and not stifling freedom of speech and expression.
